Description:
The following code triggers an assertion error. I think it is valid SystemVerilog (as it behaves correctly in ModelSim and Aldec Riviera):
module bug;

reg [4:0] a = 'b0;
initial begin
    foreach(a[i])
        $display("Value of a[%0d]=%0d",i,a[i]);
end

endmodule
Reproduced with:
$ iverilog -Wall -g2012 bug.sv -o bug
bug.sv:6: assert: elaborate.cc:4866: failed assertion dims.size() == index_vars_.size()
sh: line 1:  3219 Done                    /usr/lib/ivl/ivlpp -L -Wredef-chg -F"/tmp/ivrlg271b026f2" -f"/tmp/ivrlg71b026f2" -p"/tmp/ivrli71b026f2"
      3220 Aborted                 (core dumped) | /usr/lib/ivl/ivl -C"/tmp/ivrlh71b026f2" -C"/usr/lib/ivl/vvp.conf" -- -
$ iverilog -v
Icarus Verilog version 11.0 (devel) (s20150603-597-gdc5429e5)

[...]

If you need more info, please let me know.
